name: simplesim
description: Simple alternative to Simulationcraft intended for easy customization

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.main.js && webpack --config webpack.renderer.js && webpack --config webpack.server.js && webpack --config webpack.preload.js
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "webpack --config webpack.main.js --watch" "webpack --config webpack.renderer.js --watch" "webpack --config webpack.preload.js --watch" "wait-on dist/main/electron.js && electron dist/main/electron.js"

author: Mattias Strandberg
